column3: Never dreamed I'd get to see this side of the world before I started working for the company. Or after, for that matter. Fate's a funny thing, eh?
What would you like to do?
Hancock called for all sorts to come and join in the expedition. Plenty of work regardless of your background, he said. So here I am.
I'm a smith by trade─far from the best, but skilled enough to replicate Gerolt's works. If that sort of thing interests you, then let me know. I could use the practice!
